title: Fiscal policy to close inflationary gap

content.question: Which of the following correctly describes an effective fiscal policy action to close an inflationary gap?

choices.label: Decreasing taxes, which will increase aggregate demand
Increasing taxes, which will increase aggregate demand
Increasing government spending, which will decrease private investment
Increasing government spending, which will decrease interest rates
Decreasing government spending, which will decrease aggregate demand

content.answer: Decreasing government spending, which will decrease aggregate demand
